title: Captain Marvel star, Brie Larson, is calling for an all woman Marvel movie
text:
The 'Captain Marvel' star says she has discussed the idea with Marvel Studios President Kevin Feige.

She adds that other female heroes in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) are interested as well.

Speaking to Variety, Brie Larson says, "I will say that a lot of the female cast walked up to Kevin and we were like 'We're in this together, we want to do this'."

"What that means, I have no idea. You know, I'm not in charge of the future of Marvel but it is something that we're really passionate about.

"I feel like if enough people out in the world talk about how much they want it, maybe it will happen."

According to Variety, Kevin Feige is interested in making the all-women project.



As of now, nothing has been confirmed.

description: The 'Captain Marvel' star says she has discussed the idea with Marvel Studios President Kevin Feige.
